column4: hey, i don't know if anyone has experienced this b4, and i cant find answers elsewhere, but it seems whenever i highlight a URL in Firefox, be it in a web page or even highlight the url in the url bar, an annoying menu shows asking if I want to open the url in firefox, opera, mozilla or if i want to send the url. it uses the icons that came with my cairo-dock theme i'm using, but it only seems to happen in firefox and i can't find th
do you have add-ons installed for this?
no, not that i know of. No addons have changed that i'm aware of with the new ubuntu upgrade.
